jobTitle: RESEARCH DATA ANALYST, School of Public Health, Health Policy & Mgmt
jobDescription: Under the supervision of the Research Principal Investigator, the incumbent will be responsible for 1) participating in the development and coordination of analytic activities; 2) constructing, managing, and processing data; 3) conducting statistical analysis, developing statistical measures, summarizing and communicating analytic results through tables, graphs and reports; 4) identifying, adjusting and balancing tasks among one or more project team members to ensure timely delivery of analytic results and other deliverables; 5) participating in the design of econometric methodology for research projects; and 6) serving as an expert consultant to project related staff.Required SkillsMaster's Degree Required and 5-8 years of experience required.  Completed coursework in biostatistics or econo-metrics is required; completed coursework in linear algebra is desired.  Knowledge of statistical software such as STATA or SA is required.
